biotools.summary: > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'IMPLEMENTATION:TCSM' | Modeling clinical and molecular covariates of mutational process activity in cancer | Tumor Covariate Signature Model (TCSM) | This repository contains the code for reproducing the results on real data from the paper Modeling Clinical and Molecular Covariates of Mutational Process Activity in Cancer, which implements the Tumor Covariate Signature Model (TCSM)
